title: Create new user
text: Each customer group has it's own Cube, or several different cubes. If it's an existing user and you only need to add new stores to it: Go to Step 3 Step 1: Log in to: http://report.dddadmin.com/Login.aspx Step 2: Click on Maintain users Step 3: Select the Cube/User and follow steps in the picture *The user will not be set as Active until you have added stores to it* Step 4: Select Show / Change shops Step 5: Select the shops from the list Step 6: Scroll up and hit "Save changes" Step 7: Hit Save changes in the main screen.
description:
Each customer group has it's own Cube, or several different cubes. 

  

If it's an existing user and you only need to add new stores to it: Go to Step 3 

  

Step 1: Log in to: http://report.dddadmin.com/Login.aspx 


Step 2: Click on Maintain users 

Step 3: Select the Cube/User and follow steps in the picture 

*The user will not be set as Active until you have added stores to it* 

  

Step 4: Select Show / Change shops 

Step 5: Select the shops from the list  

Step 6: Scroll up and hit "Save changes"  

Step 7: Hit Save changes in the main screen.

title: Error - generating reports – DdDReport hangs and just keeps loading
text: http://www.dddreport.com/Login.aspx http://report.dddadmin.com/Login.aspx If DdDReport won't generate lists and is just loading, try the following: First sort on shop, then supplier, then product number, then date. If it sorts on date first, the report can hang.
description:
http://www.dddreport.com/Login.aspx 

  

http://report.dddadmin.com/Login.aspx 

  

If DdDReport won't generate lists and is just loading, try the following: 

  

First sort on shop, then supplier, then product number, then date. 

  

If it sorts on date first, the report can hang.

title: Error - Id hirachy already appears in the Axis1 axis
text: If you get the above message (could be any of the dropdowns they can use) when trying to open or refresh a report, do as follows: Grab e.g. Year (År) and, while holding down the left mouse key, drag it over to the right. Release when the box appears: Now grab it again and pull it back to its original place and release when the box appears: Now the report will work again.
description:
If you get the above message (could be any of the dropdowns they can use) when trying to open or refresh a report, do as follows: 

  

Grab e.g. Year (År) and, while holding down the left mouse key, drag it over to the right. 

Release when the box appears:  



Now grab it again and pull it back to its original place and release when the box appears:  



Now the report will work again.

title: Find store/login info
text: Either use this http://report.dddadmin.com/Login.aspx, which gives you access to the admin part immediately, or use this http://www.dddreport.com/Login.aspx and follow the below guideline. Log into DdDReport with your own credentials Click Manage users Under Maintain users: choose the shop in question Choose user name to see their details (e.g. PW). If they need a new user, click create new user and fill in the information. Then send the login information to the customer on an official email address.
description:
Either use this http://report.dddadmin.com/Login.aspx, which gives you access to the admin part immediately, or use this http://www.dddreport.com/Login.aspx and follow the below guideline. 

  

  

Log into DdDReport with your own credentials

Click Manage users  


Under Maintain users: choose the shop in question

Choose user name to see their details (e.g. PW). 

  

If they need a new user, click create new user and fill in the information. Then send the login information to the customer on an official email address.

title: List over external suppliers including EAN code
text: If the customer requests a list over external suppliers including EAN code, then that is something we cannot do. DdD Report does not have that capacity, nor does Backoffice reports.
description: If the customer requests a list over external suppliers including EAN code, then that is something we cannot do. DdD Report does not have that capacity, nor does Backoffice reports.

title: Name of new supplier is not visible in DdD Report, only their number
text: Example: Check if there is anything different with the setup of the new supplier in Backoffice (you can compare with other suppliers that you know are working). If there is no difference, log into DdD Report and check if there are multiple stores with a client ID that starts with something other than the client ID the customer has. You can see the client ID in TeamViewer if necessary. Example: If others are connected, check in Backoffice for each store whether the supplier has been created. If not, the suppliers must also be created with exactly the same name in the other groups. Otherwise, the link to the groups must be removed in DdD Report. Before forwarding the case to Dev, you need to find out the name of the cube, which groups are in the cube, and whether all groups contain the same information about the supplier. If all groups have the same information about the supplier, Dev can recalculate the cube to update the data. The name of the cube and the groups under this user can be found in DdD Report Admin.
description:
Example:

Check if there is anything different with the setup of the new supplier in Backoffice (you can compare with other suppliers that you know are working). If there is no difference, log into DdD Report and check if there are multiple stores with a client ID that starts with something other than the client ID the customer has. You can see the client ID in TeamViewer if necessary.

Example:

If others are connected, check in Backoffice for each store whether the supplier has been created.


If not, the suppliers must also be created with exactly the same name in the other groups.


Otherwise, the link to the groups must be removed in DdD Report.


Before forwarding the case to Dev, you need to find out the name of the cube, which groups are in the cube, and whether all groups contain the same information about the supplier. If all groups have the same information about the supplier, Dev can recalculate the cube to update the data.


The name of the cube and the groups under this user can be found in DdD Report Admin.

title: Want to add a new column/dimension in DdDReport.
text: Sometime,the customer contacts and ask how can they add more dimensions/columns in their report. In such case the below procedure needs to be followed along with the accompanying screenshot for reference. Open your desired report in DdD Report. When you click on the dimensions(1-Nettooms.ex moms in this case) you want to include in your report, the selected ones will be dark gray(1) and a small blue/white (2) arrow will appear on your screen also on the left side. This is clicked on to upload the desired dimensions or key figures. Press the blue/white arrow(2) when you are done (preferably once in a while while creating the report) as shown in the screenshot. Now,the report will be updated with the requested dimension/feature. Screenshot:
description:
Sometime,the customer contacts and ask how can they add more dimensions/columns in their report.

In such case the below procedure needs to be followed along with the accompanying screenshot for reference.

Open your desired report in DdD Report.


When you click on the dimensions(1-Nettooms.ex moms in this case) you want to include in your report, the selected ones will be dark gray(1) and a small blue/white (2) arrow will appear on your screen also on the left side. This is clicked on to upload the desired dimensions or key figures.


Press the blue/white arrow(2) when you are done (preferably once in a while while creating the report) as shown in the screenshot.

Now,the report will be updated with the requested dimension/feature.


Screenshot:
